firstSection.titulo:
ยก Hi, I'm Esteban Luna !
Full stack developer.

secondSection.description:
My name is Esteban Luna, I am from Argentina. I'm 21 years old.
I am a full stack developer very passionate about what I do.
I love learning new technologies and languages constantly.
I'm currently in the third year of my bachelor's degree in management.
On the other hand, I am an enthusiast of self-taught learning.
In my spare time, I enjoy reading about philosophy and psychology, hanging out with my friends and loved ones, and listening to music whenever I can.

tirdSection.cardDesc1: Prioritize my work to deliver goals in the indicated time.
tirdSection.cardDesc5: Good and fast adaptation to changes.
tirdSection.cardDesc6: The details transform a simple job into an exceptional one.
